reviewText: Saw it on a flight from London to LAX yesterday.  A very entertaining movie and apparently based on a true story.  The ending credits provided some background on the principal real-life people involved.  Thought I could purchase on Amazon but it is not offered for the USA region DVD players.  Bummer!
Just watch it, and thank me later. Fantastic action, fantasic humor. I saw it on a flight to Japan, and it was a good time. Will be buying it very soon.
